title: Number of pet stores in Canada by region 2018
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of stores in each Month on the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of stores and Yukon has the lowest Number of stores.
The Number of stores of Month Ontario is 254.0% larger than the minimum value at Yukon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of stores in the y axis.
The Number of stores is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of stores in each Month on the y axis.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of stores and Yukon has the lowest Number of stores.
The Number of stores of Month Ontario is 254.0% larger than the minimum value at Yukon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 12 number of Months.
The Number of stores is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
The second highest Number of stores is appeared to be the Month Quebec.
The maximum Month Ontario has got 254.0 times higher Number of stores than the minimum Month Yukon.
The Month Ontario has the highest Number of stores, followed by Quebec, and British Columbia. Down to the Month Yukon which is the lowest.
Over the past 12 Months, the Number of stores has declined.
Month Yukon, and Northwest Territories have a similar Number of stores that is 3.0.
The Month Ontario has 4.36 times more Number of stores than average.
The Number of stores is 2098.0 if we add up values of all Months.
